original: stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / lhar bcas skye dgu'i phan bde dbyig 'dzin gyi gzhi la rgyas shing yun du gnas par mdzad pa'i sa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rje chos kyi rgyal po spyan snga rin po che dpal ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal
analyzed: stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / lhar bcas skye dgu'i phan bde dbyig 'dzin gyi gzhi la rgyas shing yun du gnas par mdzad pa'i sa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rje chos kyi rgyal po spyan snga rin po che dpal ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal
translated: The wish-fulfilling jewel of the teachings of the one who possesses the ten powers, and the basis of the earth that spreads and remains for a long time the wealth of benefit and happiness of all living beings including the gods, is the lord of all lands, the Dharma King, the Dharma Lord, the precious one with eyes of glory, the lord of speech, the famous one who is victorious in all directions.

original: ba lha'i zhal snga nas kyis legs par bsgyur ces bka' lung dang mthun rkyen bzang po stsal ba la brten nas /
analyzed: ba lha'i zhal snga nas kyis legs par bsgyur ces bka' lung dang mthun rkyen bzang po stsal ba la brten nas /
translated: The one with the face of a god has given the excellent conditions that are in accordance with the command, saying, It is well translated.

original: legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po ka l'a pa dang / tsandra pa 'grel pa dang bcas pa dag thos shing cha shas tsam khong du chud la /
analyzed: legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po ka l'a pa dang / tsandra pa 'grel pa dang bcas pa dag thos shing cha shas tsam khong du chud la /
translated: Based on that, I have heard the great treatise on grammar that is well constructed, the KalÄpa and the Candrapa along with the commentary, and I have partially understood them.

original: sngon gyi lo ts'a ba chen po rnams kyis dam pa'i chos ji ltar bsgyur ba'i tshul phyogs tsam mthong ba dpal zhva lu'i btsun ba 'gos lo ts'a ba gsum pa dge slong dharma p'a la bha dra zhes bya bas gsung rab rin po che'i ming gi cha rnams
analyzed: sngon gyi lo ts'a ba chen po rnams kyis dam pa'i chos ji ltar bsgyur ba'i tshul phyogs tsam mthong ba dpal zhva lu'i btsun ba 'gos lo ts'a ba gsum pa dge slong dharma p'a la bha dra zhes bya bas gsung rab rin po che'i ming gi cha rnams
translated: I have seen a little of how the great translators of the past translated the holy Dharma.ğŸ”½The glorious Shawo monk GÃ¶ LotsÄwa, the third, the monk Dharma PÄlabhadra, has written this work to clear away misconceptions about the names of the precious scriptures and to newly teach a little of the way of the stainless treatises.

original: la ma rtogs pa'i 'khrul ba bsal ba dang / dri ma med pa'i gtsug lag gi tshul phyogs tsam gsar du bstan pas bstan pa rin po che'i sgo thams cad nas mi nub cing 'phel ba dang bcas pa'i rten 'brel du gyur par bsams nas /
analyzed: la ma rtogs pa'i 'khrul ba bsal ba dang / dri ma med pa'i gtsug lag gi tshul phyogs tsam gsar du bstan pas bstan pa rin po che'i sgo thams cad nas mi nub cing 'phel ba dang bcas pa'i rten 'brel du gyur par bsams nas /
translated: I have written this with the thought that it will be a cause for the precious teachings to spread and not decline in any way.

original: dpal sa skyong mchog gi bka' spyi bos mnos te sgra'i sgrub tshul rgya chen po rnams ni sngon gyi lo ts'a ba chen po rnams kyis kyang mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel pa rgyal sras ma dang / ma h'a m'a ya'i bka' 'grel yon tan ldan pa la sogs pa bod rnams kyi tshul bzhin mi rtogs par dgongs nas ma bsgyur bar snang @318a * //
analyzed: dpal sa skyong mchog gi bka' spyi bos mnos te sgra'i sgrub tshul rgya chen po rnams ni sngon gyi lo ts'a ba chen po rnams kyis kyang mngon pa mdzod kyi 'grel pa rgyal sras ma dang / ma h'a m'a ya'i bka' 'grel yon tan ldan pa la sogs pa bod rnams kyi tshul bzhin mi rtogs par dgongs nas ma bsgyur bar snang @318a * //
translated: The great translators of the past did not translate the extensive methods of Sanskrit grammar, such as the Bodhisattva Commentary on the Treasury of Abhidharma and the commentary on the Hevajra Tantra endowed with good qualities, thinking that Tibetans would not understand them properly.ğŸ”½I have left them as they are.

original: pa bzhin bzhag / ming so so nas rgya gar skad dang bod skad shan sbyar bas /
analyzed: pa bzhin bzhag / ming so so nas rgya gar skad dang bod skad shan sbyar bas /
translated: The individual names are written in Sanskrit and Tibetan side by side.

original: skabs don 'ga' zhig gi bshad pa go ba la shin tu phan par snang ba ni rgya dpe la med na'ang /
analyzed: skabs don 'ga' zhig gi bshad pa go ba la shin tu phan par snang ba ni rgya dpe la med na'ang /
translated: Although this does not appear in the Indian texts, it seems to be very helpful for understanding some of the explanations of the topics.

original: 'dus pa'i 'grel pa don gsal du bandha bandha ni chings shig pa'o zhes sogs bsgyur snang ba ltar skad gnyis ka bkod de bshad /
analyzed: 'dus pa'i 'grel pa don gsal du bandha bandha ni chings shig pa'o zhes sogs bsgyur snang ba ltar skad gnyis ka bkod de bshad /
translated: In the explanatory tantra Illuminating Lamp, it appears that bandha bandha is translated as â€œbind it.â€

original: dbri bsnan gyi dbang gis bar skabs su mtshams sbyor ba'i tshig phrad dang rnam dbye rnams bod skad la ji ltar bde bas bla thabs su bsnan /
analyzed: dbri bsnan gyi dbang gis bar skabs su mtshams sbyor ba'i tshig phrad dang rnam dbye rnams bod skad la ji ltar bde bas bla thabs su bsnan /
translated: In order to make it easier to understand, the words and particles that are used to connect the meaning in the middle are added in a way that is easy to understand in Tibetan.

original: sgra'i sgrub tshul nyung zhir gsal ba 'ga' zhig shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan la sogs pas brda sbrod pa'i tshul bod skad du bsgyur ba dang / bshad pa'i srol btod pa la brten nas /
analyzed: sgra'i sgrub tshul nyung zhir gsal ba 'ga' zhig shong ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan la sogs pas brda sbrod pa'i tshul bod skad du bsgyur ba dang / bshad pa'i srol btod pa la brten nas /
translated: Some of the few clear and concise ways of forming the sounds were translated into Tibetan in the manner of a dictionary by ShontÃ¶n DorjÃ© Gyaltsen and others, and based on that, the tradition of explaining them was established.

original: deng sang yang mkhas pa dag snang bas /
analyzed: deng sang yang mkhas pa dag snang bas /
translated: Even today, there are those who are learned in this.

original: 'ga' zhig la phan par bsams nas bsgyur te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig la phan par bsams nas bsgyur te /
translated: Thinking that it might be helpful to some, I have translated it.

original: mdor na sgra sbyor ba ma po gnyis pa las /
analyzed: mdor na sgra sbyor ba ma po gnyis pa las /
translated: In brief, in the second part of the grammar, it says:

original: dam pa'i chos bsgyur ba'i lugs ni don dang mi 'gal la /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos bsgyur ba'i lugs ni don dang mi 'gal la /
translated: The system of translating the true dharma should not contradict the meaning,

original: bod skad la yang gar bde bar gyis shig ces gsungs pa ltar bsgyur cing legs par gtan la phab pa'o //ğŸ”½de ltar gnyis med gsung ba'i gsung rab kyi //

analyzed: / thob pa'i legs spyad ston zla ltar dkar zhing // rgyu skar lam ltar yangs pa gang thob des //
translated: Is a virtuous deed that shines like the autumn moon.

original: ma lus 'gro ba'i snying gi mun bsal zhing //
analyzed: ma lus 'gro ba'i snying gi mun bsal zhing //
translated: May it illuminate the darkness in the hearts of all beings

original: rnam dpyod blo gros snang ba cher rgyas nas //
analyzed: rnam dpyod blo gros snang ba cher rgyas nas //
translated: And spread the light of discerning intelligence.ğŸ”½May all beings attain the perfect knowledge of the wise.ğŸ”½The Buddha taught the causes of karma and afflictions in the world,

analyzed: gang na skye dang rga dang rgud pa'i sdug bsngal nges par mi gnas pa //

analyzed: thar pa mchog de smra ba'i khyu mchog de yis rang gis mkhyen te gsungs //

original: gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pa'o ;
analyzed: gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pa'o ;

analyzed: /'di'i 'gyur snga phyi'i yi ge pa ni /
